creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: pastel in blues and greens; trees at right hanging over small lake; gray painted wood frame
markings:
Sticker on back center: [ No.       63-10
                                        Artist   Emile Schuffenecker
                                        Title     Landscape with Pond ]



Label taped to back in print: 

                                  [LES DEAUX ILES
      I, QUAI AUX FLEURS (Ile de la Cité) - PARIS 6 - ODE 67-76

                             Emile SCHUFFENECKER
                                      (1851-1934)
                           60 PASTELS - 40 DESSINS

                            DU 9 MAI AU 8 JUIN 1963
                 DE 10 A 20 H. - MERCREDI JUSQU\'A 22H.

            Vernissage le Jeudi 9 Mai 1963, de 16 à 22 heures]
provenance: [Les Deux Iles, Paris, until 1963; sold to Dayton]; Bruce B. and Ruth Dayton, Wayzata, Minn. (until 2010, inv. 63-10; given to MIA)
title: Landscape with Pond
